title: Is IGNOU recognised? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Commerce at Indira Gandhi National Open University

response.answer_text: IGNOU was established in 1985 under Indira Gandhi National Open University Act, 1985 (IGNOU Act 1985). It is run by the central government of India, and with over 4 million students, claims to be the largest university in the world. (IGNOU) is granted the authority to confer degrees by Clause 5(1)(iii) of the IGNOU Act 1985. It is also recognised as a Central University by the University Grants Commission of India (UGC). The Association of Indian Universities (AIU) recognises IGNOU conferred degrees as on par with the degrees conferred by its members. All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) recognises the Master of Computer Applications and Master of Business Administration program of IGNOU.
It is registered under University Grants Commission and recognised by central government of India as a distance or open university . Hope you got it .:-)
